text: Iffe-Ijumu is a town in Ijumu local government area of Kogi state in mid west Nigeria. It lies between Ekinrin-Adde and Ikoyi-Ijumu, along the road from Lokoja to Ado-Ekiti. The town is near Kabba. Chief Bayo Ojo, a former Federal Minister of Justice and Senior Advocate of Nigeria, is a native of this town, according to his Wikipedia article. : Category:Populated places in Kogi State
title: Ife-Ijumu
